title: Typing on Pixel 2 XL keyboard is hyper-sensitive. Each key stroke inputs 3, 4, 5 random letters, an
content: The keyboard is hypersensitive and each keystroke inputs 3-5 letters randomly, making it impossible to type.  I've done a factory reset, and that changed nothing.  It is fully up-to-date.  Verizon replaced it overnight and the new one is doing the same thing.
